review: Love it. Easy to install and easy t o use.

review: I liked it at first, but now it rarely works and can't even watch shows/movies anymore. I'm having to resort back to my computer, which is aggravating because the only reason I purchased it was to free up my computer.
author: misty hartman

review: I don't feel like I am being fair with this rating, but this is how I feel right now.  I don't see where it has done much for my tv viewing.  But maybe I just don't understand what it is suppose to do for me!  Need more time to see what benefits it has; for now it just wasn't worth the money I spent.
author: Sassywvmom

review: I am very happy with the Fire Stick.  It has allowed me to have more options on my tv.  Easy to use.
